com.first.whatson.connection

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.first.whatson.connection.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User: Bean, data of the user during a session By this we can follow his choices during a suggestion process, and create/access to his current emotional profile
    Author:
    alice
